title: I have problem in Async/Await
body: I am trying to use async/await in my JavaScript code, but it's not working as expected. Can someone guide me?

comments.content: Can you show the code where you are facing the issue?

replies.content: Here is the snippet: `async function fetchData() { ... }`

comments.content: Are you handling errors using try/catch?

replies.content: No, I am not. Should I add try/catch?
Yes, wrapping your async code in try/catch helps catch errors.

comments.content: Sometimes people forget to use `await` before async functions.
Also check if you are returning the promise correctly.

replies.content: Ah yes, I missed `return` in my async function.

comments.content: Make sure you are not mixing `.then()` with `await` unnecessarily.

replies.content: Thanks! I will clean up my code and try again.
